about_the_game:
Soundtrack with instrumental music created especially for the CANNON game.

Now you can enjoy the themes created by the talented music Tayana Jaques on your computer anytime.

Perfect for studying, working or just relaxing. Each track can be repeated continuously. Listen directly from your Steam client.

- Includes an original soundtrack for the CANNON game.

The soundtrack can be purchased independently of the games and is also offered in a special bundle with the game.
